name: 2D Shooter (LazyOvosc)
description:
In this game I added a little bit of modifications, so here is the list of all of them:

1) Enemy spawner(is rotating through the map and spawns enemies endlessly)

2) Power Ups(only one that gives you more health)

3) Made a health bar system instead of regular "3 lifes"

This game doesn't have multiple levels(only one).  So the game is endless and main point of the game is to get as many points as you can
